message.content: {"id": "11306", "title": "Bug 11306 - New class wizard launches simple project wizard", "description": "Since there are no existing projects, the dialog prompts the user to create a new project. This is very handy.", "OB": "When in a new workspace, in the Java perspective, press the 'New Class' button.", "EB": "When in a new workspace and in the Java perspective, pressing the 'New Class' button launches the simple project wizard.", "SR": "The 'New Class' button should launch the new class wizard instead of the simple project wizard in a new workspace and Java perspective."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
